Flower_Mound.DFW North station:
DFW North station is an under-construction FWTA commuter rail and proposed DART light rail and DART commuter rail station to be located on Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport property in Grapevine, Texas.


== FWTA commuter rail station ==
FWTA (the T) is currently planning to construct TEXRail from T&P Station in Fort Worth to DFW Airport Station in Grapevine. A key component is the DFW North station, which will provide transfers to the DART Cotton Belt Line and the DART Orange Line.
